WaveformGraph Events

Requires: Base Development System

Inherits from Control»GraphChart. View the class hierarchy.

EventDescription
Cursor GrabGenerated when the user first clicks the graph cursor to move it. This event is useful if you want to register when a user interacts with a graph cursor. Details
Cursor Grab?Generated when the user first clicks the cursor to move it. This event is useful if you want to register when a user interacts with a graph cursor, or if you want to disable user interaction with the graph cursors. Details
Cursor MoveGenerated when the user moves a cursor either by clicking and dragging the cursor or using the Cursor Movement Tool. Details
Cursor ReleaseGenerated when the user releases the cursor after dragging it. This event is useful if you want to register when a user has finished interacting with a graph cursor. Details
